recipe.title: Layered Ham and Vegetable Salad
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco)
1 pound supermarket salad bar ingredients (packed separately), including at least 4 vegetables (such as lettuce, spinach, shredded carrots, shredded red cabbage, peas and sliced mushrooms)
instructions: Whisk first 4 ingredients in small bowl to blend. Mix in blue cheese. Season dressing to taste with salt and pepper. In 6-cup soufflè dish (preferably clear glass), alternate layers of salad bar ingredients and ham. Spread dressing over; arrange cherry tomato halves and nuts, if desired, atop dressing. Serve immediately or chill up to 8 hours.
